item.title: Need help (UnIP-Mute Command)
item.dc:creator: @abcpker711 abcpker711
item.description:
@abcpker711 wrote:

Mk, so apparently I broke my un IP-Mute command by trying to add
yell(“name has unmuted blah”) and such. I have coppied the command and will paste it below, and if someone could help me out by trying to find the errors in there, you will be my bifflez and receive a cookie. But seriously, I’d like to fix this before I go to sleep, so if you could jump on this topic ASAP, it’d be awesome, haha. Thanks a million.

Command:
if (command.startsWith(“unipmute”) && playerRights > 0) {
try {
String victim = command.substring(9);
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(“config//mutes2.txt”));
BufferedWriter out = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“config//mutes2.txt”));
String unmute = command.substring(6);
String inFile;
if (victim != null)
{
int ID = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];
while ((inFile = in.readLine()) != null) {
if (inFile.equalsIgnoreCase(unmute)) {// Leave this blank we dont want it to write a file.
} else {
out.write(inFile);
}
p.disconnected = true;
}
} catch (IOException e) {
e.printStackTrace();
}
}

~ Kevin

Read full topic
